titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Nunaka Valley Little League Junior girls softball team on winning the 2012 Little League Junior Softball World Series.
A resolution congratulating the Nunaka Valley Little League Junior girls softball team on winning the 2012 Little League Junior Softball World Series.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Nunaka Valley Little League junior girls softball team on winning the 2012 Little League Junior Softball World Series.
